Mirabeau, Honoré-Gabriel de Riquetti, comte de, 1749-1791. Chien après les moines
metadata.citation: Barbier, A.A. Ouvrages anonymes, I, column 584
metadata.description: Usually attributed to Mirabeau, although Mercier and Théveneau de Morande have also been suggested. Cf. Barbier
Also published under title: Le chien après les moines
Possible date of publication from Barbier
Not in Martin & Walter. Révolution française
"Épitre a Mademoiselle Guimard par M. M****"--P. [30]-32
metadata.notes: No Copyright found. No Table of Contents found. Title on cover page. Damaged, stained pages and cover.
